 **adverb** ==thus, as follows== (Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כֵּן‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כֵּן‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — usually with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲמַר‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אָמַ‎</span>, etc.; compare Egyptian Aramaic [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>ii. 149 A 1, B-C 3</sup> RÉS<sup>492 B 5</sup>), [[Dan.2.24|Dan 2:24]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וְכֵן אֲמַרלֵֿהּ‎</span>, v[[Dan.2.25|Dan 2:25]]; [[Dan.4.11|Dan 4:11]]; [[Dan.6.7|Dan 6:7]]; [[Dan.7.5|Dan 7:5]]; [[Dan.7.23|Dan 7:23]]; [[Ezra.5.3|Ezra 5:3]]; [[Ezra.6.2|Ezra 6:2]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וְכֵןכְּֿ תִיב בְּגַוַּהּ‎</span>.
